thought.text: Interesting! The config is not loading the ignore_paths from pyproject.toml. Let me check why this is happening and fix the test:

action.old_str:
# Create a linter instance
        linter = PyLinter()
        _config_initialization(linter, ['src/'], reporter=None, config_file=None, verbose_mode=None)
action.new_str:
# Create a linter instance
        linter = PyLinter()
        _config_initialization(linter, ['src/'], reporter=None, config_file='pyproject.toml', verbose_mode=None)
